entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.US.0071.7646] The filing has reported a value for the element us-gaap:CostOfGoodsAndServicesSold with a value of 176,000 using the ProductOrServiceAxis in the role 003 - Statement - Consolidated Statements of Income and Comprehensive Income on the table us-gaap:StatementTable. However, the only member used to disaggregate the total for us-gaap:CostOfGoodsAndServicesSold was the member us-gaap:ShippingAndHandlingMember. If only one member is used on this axis then the filer should either:
1. Retag the filing using the element TypeOfRevenueExtensibleList/TypeOfCostGoodOrServiceExtensibleList with a value of us-gaap:ShippingAndHandlingMember and the member us-gaap:ShippingAndHandlingMember should be removed from the value as it represents the aggregate value of us-gaap:CostOfGoodsAndServicesSold.
2. Tag the aggregate value of us-gaap:CostOfGoodsAndServicesSold with a value of 176,000 without the product of service axis. This rule will not generate an error if the aggregate value of us-gaap:CostOfGoodsAndServicesSold is reported.
The properties of this us-gaap:CostOfGoodsAndServicesSold fact are: Period :2021-01-01 to 2021-12-31 Dimensions : srt:MajorCustomersAxis=ff:RelatedPartiesMember, srt:ProductOrServiceAxis=us-gaap:ShippingAndHandlingMember Unit : USD
Rule Element Id:7646 Rule version: 26.0.9 - ff20231231_10k.htm 4921
